item.description:
BBQ * Blessing * Music by BB Gunz * Free Event - Voluntary Donations Gratefully Accepted
The Reverend Victoria A. Pretti, Priest-in-Charge, Episcopal Church of Our Saviour (Viki is a WOW Member)
The plan is to meet in Middleboro, stop at Monty's for the Open House (lunch stop), and continue up to Milton.
453 Adams Street, Milton, MA 02186
We will arrive between 1:00 and 1:30pm***Blessing at 2:00pm sharp
Refreshments and Raffle 12:30 to 3:30pm
There is a group Ride that will leave the church @ 3:40 pm.  (Some from WOW may participate in this ride.)
Rain or Shine Event - If you can’t ride, come inside and let us bless your helmets, keys and gear!
item.name: Bike Blessing
